channel.title: Started C++ RS2 server 2 days ago
channel.description:
Anyways I started from scratch a rs2 server in c++
Since my C++ skill is very low.. but whatever... It ran good now I got a compile error I can't solve!
looking for people to help me out... i ran into a problem I can't solve something with not being able to find PlayerHandler
at first I was pointer happy and started making everything pointers now im doing stuff on stack and its giving me problems.. i want it exactly like winterlove server only in C++
so anyone who got any experience i'll attach the project here hoping someone could atleast solve my error..
Also I noticed the java Cryption had >>>'s couldn't find those in C++ but >> should do the trick. Before when it was compiling without any problems it ran really smoothly.
anyways I attached it.

item.title: Started C++ RS2 server 2 days ago
item.dc:creator: @moparscape4lifez moparscape4lifez
item.description:
@moparscape4lifez wrote:

Anyways I started from scratch a rs2 server in c++

Since my C++ skill is very low… but whatever… It ran good now I got a compile error I can’t solve!

looking for people to help me out… i ran into a problem I can’t solve something with not being able to find PlayerHandler

at first I was pointer happy and started making everything pointers now im doing stuff on stack and its giving me problems… i want it exactly like winterlove server only in C++

so anyone who got any experience i’ll attach the project here
hoping someone could atleast solve my error…

Also I noticed the java Cryption had >>>'s couldn’t find those in C++ but >> should do the trick.
Before when it was compiling without any problems it ran really smoothly.

anyways I attached it.
